channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5286] Italy // EOL products appear not EOL in IT shop
item.description:
products 631479 and 242512

they are status 80 in Movex.

CH shop they EOL - correct
IT shop they can be order - NOT correct
item.summary: Italy // EOL products appear not EOL in IT shop

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: I have reset the last modified ERP for all products so that they get updated for sure with the next sales status update. The last modified ERP date was newer than the one in the file, so the status was never updated. This can happen if Movex has exported once a wrong date. The issue should be fixed within 1 hour.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5284] Italy / Proditec products avialbility
item.description:
Issue today is only for availability <10 giorni
Italy - for all Proditec products, the availability shown for <10 g = the availability of the ELFA warehouse

CH - for all Proditec products he availability shown for <10 g = Proditec
availability - CH 24 h

The business process is that for Italy there will never be transported Proditec products from ELFA to Italy.

Therefore this <10 g availability is false. Italy needs to have the same availability as CH ( <10 g)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Raphi,
The availability for ITA should be:

  • No Elfa Stock at all
  • Proditec Stock should be the same as in CH.

We have removed the ELFA stock for IT.
The second issue needs a deployment to be fixed, as the current implementation is not considering this case.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5255] DE Testing - Not able to create additional address
item.description:
Issue
Not able to create additional address.

Steps to reproduce

  1. B2B Customer wants to create delivery adress in webshop.
  2. Gets below error message: You are not allowed to add an address.
  3. BUT in Webshop address is created . AND NOT transferred to SAP.

Reporter Mirco Saager
item.summary: DE Testing - Not able to create additional address

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
The solution for this ticket will be implemented based on the table "Customer type permissions for NEW SAP"
https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/IF-08+Customer+Service

Hi Ruben
from the backend point of view all the functionalities are there.

We should adjust the frontend part accordingly.
As reference we can have a look to the movex websites (CH for example)

New Billing address section shown for SAP (DE).
Please test after the next deployment.
Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5158] The name of the orderer is not been displayed
item.description:
Exception:
on the 3. line has to be written the estimated delivery date

fact:
there is no 3. line with this information

is the case written wrong?

The name of the orderer is not been displayed as well
item.summary: The name of the orderer is not been displayed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Nabil,
Could you please check why the name of the orderer is not been displayed?

After looking into the source code, we have the following:

<sec:authorize ifAllGranted="ROLE_B2BADMINGROUP">
	<li class="entry">
		<dl>
			<dt class="label"><spring:message code="accountlist.orderHistoryList.orderedBy" /></dt>
			<dd class="value">${order.userFullName}</dd>
		</dl>
	</li>
</sec:authorize>

This means that only members of the b2badmingroup are allowed to see the orderer name.

Regarding the delivery estimated date, does SAP provide this information ?
Nop, you can leave this out.
We are waiting for the change in SAP to retrieve the contact ID of the contact that has ordered.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5087] OCI/Ariba Conversion-Tracking (continue)
item.description:
Remaining open issues of ticket (DISTRELEC-3220):

  • custom ecommerce parameter discount value and voucher value are containing strings instead of values
  • numbers need to be float values
  • product costs and order value are wrong

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Local configuration not working

To solve these issues:

  • custom ecommerce parameter discount value and voucher value are containing strings instead of values
  • numbers need to be float values

We can reuse DISTRELEC-4604
Fixed. Waiting for the merge of branch into trunk

Fixes included in DISTRELEC-3220
When tested, we can close this ticket.
Thanks

Hi Ruben

Accordingly please provide me with a testable OCI-link for test.a.distrelec.de

Thx Mark

https://test.a.distrelec.de/ociEntry?username=distrelec.test.oci@distrelec.com&password=123456&hook_url=https://www.sap.com&oci_version=4.0

Please open this URL in a Chrome incognito window to avoid cache and cookies.
Thanks

Tested and verified on test.a.distrelec.de (v3.0.m12) with Chrome Incognito-mode (compare attached screenshot). The pre-indicated issues do not seem to be resolved (and there are further issues) as following:

  • Webtrekk-request is 'only' triggered when clicking on the 'Gehe zu ERP'-button on the top -> Webtrekk-request is to be equally triggered for both buttons (top & bottom)
  • cb7: Would need to be 'oci'
  • cb6: Would need to be '1.71' (. insteatd of ,)
  • cb5: Entirely missing in the request
  • cb9: Would need to reflect the Voucher value (in this case '0.00')
  • cb10: Would need to reflect the Discount value (in this case '0.00')

Please also refer to the Spec in this regard.

Thx Mark
Please test it after the next deployment

Hello Mark,
You can already test using this link:

https://test.distrelec.de/ociEntry?username=oci@distrelec.com&password=123456&hook_url=https://www.sap.com&oci_version=4.0

I attach the screenshot from Fiddler as well.
Thanks
Ruben

Tested and verified on test.distrelec.de (v3.0.m19) - compare the two attached screenshots:

  • orderValue (ov): Currently: 8 / Required: 7.88 (float value required)
  • Shipping costs (cb8): Currently: 0.00 / Required: 6.00 (reflecting the shipping costs of the order)
  • Discount & Voucher value (cb9 & cb10): Please test/verify that these two ecommerce-parameters would be transmitted properly as well if applicable in an OCI-order.

Please verify and refactor! Mark

Please test after the next deployment
thanks!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5009] New Products Store
item.description:
Description
Initial Position: Clearance Store: http://www.distrelec.ch/clearance
We need this store for new products. The products have already been flagged in the ERP with the promotion label "NEW".
URL: http://www.distrelec.ch/new
Countries: AT, IT, CH, LT, ELFA(SE, NO, DK, PL)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Hi Surendra, please investigate if all information we need is present and estimate.

Additional spec info:
Decision whether a product is visible in the "NEW shop" is based on the SalesOrg-specific SalesStatus. Additionally we define a maximal duration (e.g. 60 days) to consider an article as new. After this time frame the article will not be considered as new even the SalesStatus from ERP is 10 (=new).
We already use this logic to display the "NEW" label in the shop.

Added new products store analog to outlet store.
The new products store uses the promotion label 7 as a query.

<ns2:Filter>
	<ns2:name>PromotionLabels</ns2:name>
	<ns2:substring>true</ns2:substring>
	<ns2:valueList>
		<ns2:FilterValue>
			<ns2:type>or</ns2:type>
			<ns2:value>rank:7,active:true</ns2:value>
		</ns2:FilterValue>
	</ns2:valueList>
</ns2:Filter>

Open Issues:

  • create impex statements for cms content. i have done it for CH_de and CH_en
    • /distrelecB2Bcore/resources/distrelecB2Bcore/import/project/contentCatalogs/distrelec_CHContentCatalog/cms-content.impex
    • /distrelecB2Bcore/resources/distrelecB2Bcore/import/project/contentCatalogs/distrelec_CHContentCatalog/cms-content_de.impex
    • /distrelecB2Bcore/resources/distrelecB2Bcore/import/project/contentCatalogs/distrelec_CHContentCatalog/cms-content_en.impex
  • testing

Hi Nando,

I don't know who is responsible for the cms content impexes. Can you please assign the ticket?
The task which needs to be done is similiar to https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-4897

Thanks
Pascal

Raphael, can you take care of the impexes or assign accordingly?
Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4703] SearchResultPromotionLabelPopulator gets the ProductModel
item.description:
In the SearchResultPromotionLabelPopulator which is called while converting the SearchResult retrieved from Factfinder, the ProductModel is also retrieved.

This should strongly be avoided for performance reasons.

SearchResultPromotionLabelPopulator :

final List<DistPromotionLabelData> activeLabels = distPromotionLabelsFacade.getActivePromotionLabelsForProductCode(target.getCode());

DefaultDistPromotionLabelsFacade:

public List<DistPromotionLabelData> getActivePromotionLabelsForProductCode(final String code) {
        final List<DistPromotionLabelModel> promotionLabels = getDistPromotionLabelsService().getActivePromotionLabelsForProduct(
                getProductService().getProductForCode(code));
        return Converters.convertAll(promotionLabels, getPromotionLabelConverter());
    }

As a side effect, this also leads to a 500er page instead of showing the productlist, if a product does not exist in Hybris.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4660] Wrong availability information in FF
item.description: Stock information for products available within >7 days is incorrect in FF. Instead of a 0, I receive a 1, which breaks the ranking rule for showing the available products first.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Daniela,
Is this issue appearing since today?
We deployed some stock modifications yesterday evening. Maybe this should be solved after the next FF import.
This issue appears since around the change from 72hrs to 7 days. I observed it for a while, but it does not go away. I checked with the 717551 again, and it's still the same. 1 instead of 0.

The issue seems to get worse: I now even have products on stock (according to shop display) and indicated with 0 in FF, messing up the entire sorting.

E.g. 885304

Sorry, wrong article no. This query here is a "nice" example: http://www.distrelec.ch/search?q=clicktronic
The available products (according to shop) are at the bottom, cause I get 0 as availability indicator in FF. Setting the availability filter makes things even more interesting:
http://www.distrelec.ch/search?q=clicktronic&filter_InStock=1

I've checked some examples and I didn't find any differences anymore.
Same on your side?

Unfortunately, it seems not to be entirely fixed.

E.g. when searching for Messgeräte in CH-DE, we have in the shop 7d and >7d, but in FF I always have 1. Same in a case when I search for fish.

So it's still not entirely fixed.
@Daniela: You are right, we missed one case!
@Raphael

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4480] Cart // Direct Order
item.description:
The auto-suggest-function has been adjusted by Daniela to rank article-numbers higher than type-numbers in order to display relevant suggests if an article-number has been entered.
The problem is that this change is not reflected for the direct-order functionality. We need the adjustment also there, it is even more important to have it there as mostly article-numbers will be entered there.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: @Daniela: Have you already spoken with Mr. Türk about this issue? Because the shop is just displaying the list of products that have been returned by FF, we do no resorting or something similar. So I think FF is not taking care of your settings for own or special suggest types, because the "direct order" is an own suggest-type. Probably your settings get not applied to this. Should I check that with Mr. Türk or are you taking care of this?
Contacted Mr. Türk about the issue and awaiting answer. If he does not answer by Tuesday, I'll ask Martin Koch, who will be here on Wednesday.

Answer from Mr. Türk: Hallo Frau Truttmann,
grundsätzlich erfolgen beide Suggest-Suchen im gesamten Bestand der Vorschläge. Die unter Konfiguration > Suggest > Import hinterlegten Suchdatenfelder haben direkten Einfluss auf die gefunden Vorschläge. Zudem werden sicherlich auch Filter über die Suggest-Konfiguration angewandt, um EOL- und ausverkaufte Produkte auszublenden.
Letztendlich werden auch Shop-seitig gewisse Vorschlagstypen ausgeblendet, wenn es um das Suggest-Flyout zur Direktbestellung geht.

As I kind of only understand half of it (resp. lack the insight into the settings of the shop), I would like to ask you to contact him directly to clarify this...

@Daniela: I'm not sure if I can help you, but we do nothing on shop side to change the sorting logic or something else. I think FF is just not returning the correct suggests or as I can see the searchable fields configured in the suggest for example on the test system for ch_de is slightly different. Probably this has also an effect on the result.
So I think, it will not help if I discuss this topic with Mr. Türk, except he is asking for some configuration changes that you can not mange by the back office.
@Raphael: I think we defined to use the same suggest for the direct order as for the search, didn't we?
No not yet
Can we do it? Or is there anything that keeps us from doing so?
We can do it, but this is a change on code side not on FF side. So it needs to be deployed.
maybe we should quickly discuss it? I do not know what the consequences would be (resp. if there are any...)
@Daniela: Should I go ahead with the change to one single suggest field?
Yes, let's do it. Did you check about the possibility to easily undo it (as discussed) - can you do it? Might be nice if it's not working as wished...

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4331] Download zip files/EPS files
item.description:
The hybris hmc doesn’t support eps files or zip files.

Please see screenshots.

I checked all other new platforms and apparently the link for the .zip-file doesn’t work in all of them.

I then tried uploading a new .zip-file and a new .eps-file for DK with the Elfa Logo (you find the images attached) but both links don’t work:

http://prod.distrelec.dk.distrelec.com/medias/sys_master/h00/hec/8858202275870/ElfaDistrelec_Logo_CMYK.zip
http://prod.distrelec.dk.distrelec.com/medias/sys_master/h35/hec/8858204012574/DAT_Logo_ElfaDistrelec_CMYK.ps

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
At first sight it looks like you are in the image media dialog.
I would suppose that the download media dialog would be intended for this, however that one doesn't allow eps either.

Raphael, would it be as simple as adding a new asset type?
This gets fixed with the next deployment. The issue was that we did not forward request for *.zip and *.ps.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2194] 8.2 Events --> Refactoring needed (functional testing failing so far)
item.description:
Compare e.g.: test.distrelec.ch or http://test.distrelec.ch/de/LED-Stromversorger-60-W-Mean-Well-PLC-60-12/p/11025504

Given: 'activatedEvents' : ['add_products', 'add-cdo', 'acc-att', 'req-hbr', 'add-nsl', 'add-ltc', 'blk-afl', 'blk-acl', 'blk-asl', 'add-ltc', 'blk-rsl', 'cart', 'download', 'list', 'cart', 'compare', 'favorite', 'list', 'print', 'share', 'sup', 'fdb', 'nlt'],

--> So far no tracking-requests are transmitted (except for 'add_products') by click on the specified events (compare Spec p. 17)

  • OS: W7
  • UA: FF 25.0
item.summary: 8.2 Events --> Refactoring needed (functional testing failing so far)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Sieht mir eher nach FE issue aus.

Hi Dominic

  • Event 'cart' --> on product detail sites missing as second request (e.g. compare http://test.distrelec.ch/en/Windows-7-Home-Premium-ita-Vollversion-1-Microsoft-GFC-00142/p/11062288)
  • toolsitem.skin.shopping-bulk ('list'): So far not working
  • shoppinglist-add-to-cart ('add-ltc'): So far not working

Thx Mark
Info: only marks comment is still open. the issues described in the ticket are resolved.

1) Event Cart: This event is already implemented and only needs to be activated. But it is only implemented on the Toolsitem Cart Button (the icon one with the 8 corners) and not on normal Buttons. This means on the Product Detail View, a Click on "Zum Warenkorb hinzufügen..." does not trigger an 8.2 Event.

2) There was a bug which is now resolved.

3) Should already trigger an Event, see the attached Screenshot showing the two requests.
See comment, just call me if you think its easier to discuss over the phone.

4) Regarding 'Event Cart' (-> referring to 'toolsitem.skin.cart'):

--> In terms of Toolsitem Cart Button (the icon one with the 8 corners) the additional event is e.g. not triggered so far for 'Meta HD Flyout Search'

5) Generally please implement the additional event also for normal Buttons (Suche Global, Product Detail View, Meta HD Flyout Search, Compare View, BOM Manager, Shopping Lists)

6) Event 'Shopping Lists /shopping' (-> referring to 'shoppinglist-meta-actions'): So far not working

Thx Mark
4) Added 8.2 Event Tracking to Meta HD Suggest. Resolved.
6) Cannot reproduce. Was the event that maybe not activated? If the issue is still there, please describe it in more detail.

5)

Implemented:

√ Product Detail View (Buying Section)
√ Meta HD Flyout Search (Same as in 4)
√ Compare View
√ BOM Manager (Add to Cart und Add to List Buttons)

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Not Implemented:

  • Suche Global

Please define Tracking ID and which Button exactly should be tracked.

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Was already implemented:

  • Shopping Lists

Please define Tracking ID and which Button exactly should be tracked.

5) Okay (as discussed on phone: 'Suche Global' = 'Meta HD Flyout Search')

6) Event 'Shopping Lists /shopping': Event is activated and executed. However, the request is so far not poperly (aborted) transmitted. I have shortly looked into this: It seems that a pagereload is generated onclick. Question: Is 'sendunload' accordingly considered for the event?

Thx Mark
6) Okay. Which Event do you mean? "Add a new Shopping List" or "Add all Items to Cart" or another one?

6) The event 'Add a new Shopping List' is meant.

Mark

6) The problem here is the same as in another ticket: The event is fired, but not completely because of the following page load. The specification said, that sendOnUnload would make this possible, bis it does not work. As far as I know, we do not habe the possibility to track this event.

Hi Mark

Please see my latest comment. Unfortunately, I think this can not be tracked. But you could check back with your Webtrekk Contact and ask him, if he knows a solution to track something by Javascript with an immediate page load.

Please compare E-Mail dated Montag, 3. Februar 2014 09:09

Ciao Dominic

Danke für dein Feedback bezüglich DISTRELEC-2648 bzw. -2194.

Wie von dir erwähnt werde ich das gerne umgehend mit unserer Ansprechperson bei Webtrekk anschauen. Ich habe mir dazu den Quellcode (base-Js) angeschaut. Könntest du mir bitte kurz angeben, auf welche Js-Funktion sich z.B. die Klasse 'btn btn-primary' (bezieht sich auf den Fall 'req-snd') bezieht?

Ciao Mark

The best way to see this issue is in the form-feedback module. Suche dazu im File "http://www.distrelec.at/_ui/all/cache/base.js" einfach mal nach "Tc.Module.FormFeedback". Dort passiert nach einem Klick auf den Absenden Button folgendes:

1) sendForm() wird aufgerufen
2) sentFormSuccessful() wird aufgerufen
3) trackEventFormSent wird aufgerufen
3) webtrekkEvent wird gefeuert, was "onWebtrekkEvent" aufruft im Modul "Tc.Module.Webtrekk"
4) wt.sendinfo(webtrekkObj) wird aufgerufen

Diese Details musst du aus meiner Sicht aber gar nicht so genau verstehen. Wichtig wäre nur zu wissen, ob man einen Tracking Event auslösen kann, wenn danach ein PageLoad folgt. Aus meiner Sicht geht das eben nicht.

Move Implementation to on site link.

Rename onWebtrekkOnSiteLink to onWebtrekkEventWithPageLoad in webtrekk.js. Only used in newsletter subscribe so far.

Even if I put the following code directly into the HTML of the Newsletter Subscribe Button, the Request does not seem to be transmitted. You can try and add this via Firebug into the Markup on test.distrelec.at and see it for yourself.

onclick="wt.sendinfo(

{linkId:'ch.ons.test.-',sendOnUnload:1}

);"

Hi Dominic

As far as I know Webtrekk Js-functionalities need to be fully and properly initialised during page-loading. That is why a Markup-test within is not working in this regard via Firebug 'from scratch'.

A analogous working example (onclick-event Webtrekk function-call) you can find as following: https://www.distrelec.ch/home (click on promobox - compare attached screenshot).

For an according Hybris-testing please setup a 'onclick="wt.sendinfo(

{linkId:'ch.ons.test.-',sendOnUnload:1}

);"'-example on a test-environment (test-page) in order to test the Webtrekk-behaviour on the basis of a givne page-load.

Thx Mark

Hi Mark
Okay good to know, but I already tested this and I tested it now again putting the following link tag in the JSP:

<a href="https://distrelec-ch.local:9002/my-account" onclick="wt.sendinfo(

{linkId:'ch.ons.test.-',sendOnUnload:1}

);">Test</a>

I also tried the one from the current Distrelec Homepage Promo Teaser. There must be another issue. Is maybe a certain plugin not activated or included in the webtrekk v3 Javascript file?

Hi Dominic

I have created an according test-link on Q-environment (http://test.distrelec.ch/de//cms/Technische%20Informationen). Seems to work (compare attached screenshot)

Bests, Mark

Only visible in a traffic sniffer like fiddler.

Todo with Mark: Define affected Module and theri Link ID, see https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/Webtrekk+-+Frontend+Implementation "Events with Page Loads (ehemals Onsite Links)"

See Table "Events with Page Loads (ehemals Onsite Links)", I added every Module thats needs this.

+ Add ID, check that it is a "WithPageLoad" Event
+ Check via Fiddler Sniffer if Values are transmitted
All "Events Link Tags mit name Attribut on Page Load" Impelmented and Tested with Traffic Sniffer.

Hi Dominic

The fix-version v0.5. is noted. Howevere this must have been deployed later on. Is that checked-in respectively foreseen for deployment (FYI: not contained in the 1.1.6 Q-deployment according to release notes)?

Thx Mark

Hi Mark

This is already deployed on http://test.distrelec.at

Hi Dominic

Testing done on test.distrelec.at respectively last item on test.distrelec.ch:

  • sup: WT-request not transmitted in Chrome (thinkable reason: name-attribute before href-tag -> compare attached screenshot) / please submit 'sup-sup' in this case (as specified in the WT-Spec)
  • fdb: WT-request not transmitted in Chrome (thinkable reason: name-attribute before href-tag -> compare attached screenshot) / please submit 'fdb-fdb' in this case (as specified in the WT-Spec)
  • fdb-snd: Could not test that successfully. Please verify.
  • srh-snd: Could not test that successfully. Please verify.
  • spa-spa | spa-snd: Could not test successfully. Please verify (tested via http://test.distrelec.at/de/DET4TC2-%2B-KIT%2C-spieslose-Erdungspr%C3%BCfung-Megger---1000-404/p/serviceplus/90040788)
  • req-hbr | req-snd: Tested 'req-hbr' successfully. Could not test 'req-snd' successfully - please verify (http://test.distrelec.ch/de/Laborkabel-%C3%B8-4-mm-rot-100-cm-Multi-Contact-SML-100cm-red/p/14022002)

Mark

Hi Mark

I only tested the first one "sup" with my traffic sniffer and could see the request after clicking on the Button "Support". I attached a Screenshot.

Don't you see it in your Traffic Sniffer?

Regarding 'sup':

  • Seems to work with IE and FF
  • With Chrome the request seems not to be transmitted. On similar implementations (e.g. Footer-Links) it is yet working. Thereby the name-attribute is however after the href-tag. In order to get 'sup' also in Chrome to work I assume that the name-attribute needs to be placed after the href-tag.

Mark

It also already works in Chrome, but I changed the attribute order anyway.

I tested all those event IDs with my Traffic Sniffer and in my opinion they are all working.

Hi Dominic

E.g. 'fdb-snd' (to be transmitted on successful transmission of the feedback-form) I have also tested privately (no corporate traffic restrictions) on test.distrelec.at. The according request containing the ID seems not to be transmitted. Could you please attach a screenshot of the according Traffic-Sniffer request showing the request respectively the stated ID?

The support-'process' seems to be '2-step' by now. Is 'sup-snd' also implemented?

Thx Mark

1. Der Event heisst fdk-snd und nicht fdb-snd. Soll ich ihn umbenennen in fdb-snd? The event is sent locally on my machine but not on test.distrelec.ch. I am investigating the issue...

2. Support Process is implemented as one step. I will add the second step. Which ID should be used?

Hi Dominic

1. Sorry my mistake (mistyping) -> fdk-snd is correct

2. ID. sup-snd

Thx Mark

Hi Mark

1) Ok

2) Ok, I added this event.

I investigated why you could not see every event on test.distrelec.at. You have to add these events to the list of activated events via HMC. I added fdk-snd and sup-snd to test.distrelec.at and now you should be able to see those too. I attached you a Screenshot.

Ticket resolved.

Hi Dominic

I have tested the implementation on test.distrelec.at. Some findings:

  • Support 1st step: Current: sup -> Required: sup-sup
  • Support 2nd step (http://test.distrelec.at/de/Support/cms/support): Request containing 'sup-snd' is not transmitted on successful form-transmission.
  • Feedback 1st step: Current: fdb -> Required: fdb-fdb
  • Feedback 2nd step (http://test.distrelec.at/de/Feedback/cms/feedback): Request containing 'fdb-snd' is not transmitted on successful form-transmission. Request is however transmitted if captcha is entered wrongly. To be refactored.

-> Pleae verify for all according events on test.distrelec.at and refactor accordingly.

Thx Mark

Hi Mark

Which if the issues in this ticket are still open? All in your latest comment?

Thanks!

Hi Dominic

In my view there is preliminary 'issue' (pre-condition to enable thorough testing/verification) which needs to be initially tackled in this regard: In case that new events are defined and implemented (as the once in this ticket) their id's shall automatically be added to the list of activated events by default (given also in case of redeployments). Could that be implemented given a reasonable effort?

Thx Mark

Discussed with Mark on the phnone:

check sup / sup-sup and fdb / fdb-fdb and then close this ticket. for any other issues, mark will open a new ticket.

Changed ID's as described and verified that all four are transmitted:

sup-sup and sup-snd
fdb-fdb and fdb-snd

Can be tested on test.distrelec.ch after the next deployment.

Hi Dominic

As agreed I am going to test the above indicated four events as soons as they are deployed. For the remaining events I am going to open a new ticket and assign to you.

Bests, Mark

Please deploy asap on HP-Q.

Thx Mark

Mark, this is deployed.
If it works please set the ticket to "closed".
Thanks

Hi Dominic

I have just tested sup-sup and sup-snd respectively fdb-fdb and fdb-snd on test.distrelec.ch (I have added the according event-id's via hmc).

sup-sup, sup-snd and fdb-fdb are transmitted.

So far I cannot reproduce a Webtrekk-request for fdb-snd

To note the implementation for sup-snd and fdb-snd seems to be different:

  • sup-snd: <button class="btn btn-primary" type="submit" data-webtrekk-linkid="ch.ons.sup-snd.-"><i></i>Senden</button>
  • fdb-snd: <button type="submit" name="submit" data-webtrekk-linkid="ch.ons.fdb-snd.-" class="btn btn-primary">Feedback senden<i></i></button>

Please verify and refactor.

Thx Mark
Assigning to Florian, as Dominic is not on the project anymore.

Hi Ruben

I have integrated DISTRELEC-3796 as a subtask of this ticket. Analogous to the teaser-tracking I have put together an overview (compare attached .xls-file) regarding refactoring of the Event-tracking.

All Events that need refactoring are indicated in column A in red. To note respectively to consider always: All Events should only be triggered if listed as 'activated' ID's in the Webtrekk-pixel of the according webpage.

For the Events on row 29 & 31 I would require (test-) links to verify the status of the current implementation as well as to verify further implementations (I have sent an according request to Florian via e-mail).

There is a new, additional Event (compare row 40): For any click on a 'Live Support'-button an Event tracking-request shall be triggered via event-handler as following (implementation-example for the CH-webshop):

"onclick=wt.sendinfo(

{linkId:'ch.ons.lct-lct.-'}

);"

Please estimate the required effort for that. As mentioned it may be a good idea to align shortly with Dominic in this regard before start refactoring.

Thx Mark

We are trying to trigger the webtrekk tracking call when clicking on the Live Chat link. This link is generated by Vivocha, and injected into our give-us-feedback module.

So at the end we have this link.

<a class="btn" data-webtrekk-linkid="de.ons.lct-lct.-">

But it does not trigger the webtrekk call. It looks that Webtrekk is not working for elements created by DOM manipulation

Please test after the next deployment
Thanks!

attachment.name: Distrelec Schweiz. Alles rund um Elektronik, Automation, Computer & Zubehör.png
attachment.author: mdiggelmann

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4745] SEO - URL Migration Issues - Old diverse url pattern redirected to new equivalents
item.description:
Old patterns redirected to new equivalents :

n° state issue url_from exemple url_to redirect exemple redirection status to use notes/regex
2 ok old product url http://www.distrelec.ch/notebook-rucksack-ultra-39-6-cm-15-6/wenger/l22-1010-01/841806/it-&-zubeh%C3%B6r;jsessionid=C01F77BA1C223512B9264F6EEEF569AE.daechj010u http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Ultra-notebook-rucksack-39-6-cm-%2815-6%22%29-black-Wenger-L22-1010-01/p/11027541 301 If no new website product match, 301 redirect to lower hierarchy level available
3 ok old printing product url http://www.distrelec.ch/ishopWebFront/catalog/product.do;jsessionid=6E6FF3BE859A335AF5A90FCA88EBAF6F.daechj013u?keywords=DC_motors_RH(E)158,_with_gearbox&series=1&id=01&node=42863&artView=true&productNr=378067 http://www.distrelec.ch/en/DC-motor%2C-39-6-mm%2C-with-gearbox-75%3A1-24-VDC-Micro-Motors-RH158-75%3A1-24V/p/15448378 301 If no new website product match, 301 redirect to lower hierarchy level available
4 nok Old comparaison printing page https://distrelec.ch/ishopWebFront/catalog/product.do/para/keywords/* http://www.distrelec.ch/ishopWebFront/catalog/product.do/para/keywords/is/MMB0207,MMB0207,Vishay,%25C2%25B1Metal_film_resistor_SMD_820K_1___0207,MELF_Res.html+&cd=1&hl=fr&ct=clnk http://www.distrelec.ch/ 301
5 nok The old family must be redirected in 301 to the new webshop family urls https://www.distrelec.ch/zywall-usg-firewall/zyxel/2876/it-&-accessories/en new family url 301  
6 nok 404 on pdf https://www.distrelec.ch/ishop/Datasheets/*.pdf https://www.distrelec.ch/ishop/Datasheets/XRCGB25M000F0L00R0.pdf http://www.distrelec.ch/Web/Downloads/_t/ds/HCR%20Crystal%20Resonator_eng_tds.pdf?mime=application%2Fpdf (if not possible, 301 to the product) 301 Need to find the db that match id and name between pdf
7 nok 404 or bad 200 on manufacturer(https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-4593) http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/metrix & http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/aul http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/ 301  
8 ok Faulty redirect on manufacturer ishopWebFront/catalog/manufacturer.do* http://www.distrelec.ch/ishopWebFront/catalog/manufacturer.do/para/id/is/01/and/language/is/en/and/shop/is/BE.html http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/ 301  
9 ok Old Shop redirection ishopWebFront/expert/enter.do* http://www.distrelec.ch/ishopWebFront/expert/enter.do?dispatch=memoryShop&shop=IT&language=it&gclid=CMWr9dmuzJ8CFSIslAoddnOF1A http://www.distrelec.ch/ 301  
10 ok Old Internal Search *&typePhrase=* or *&keywordPhrase=* http://www.distrelec.ch/ishopWebFront/search/luceneSearch.do?dispatch=find&showImage=on&artnrPhrase=&typePhrase=AN6545SP or https://www.distrelec.ch/ishopWebFront/search/luceneSearch.do?dispatch=find&keywordPhrase=251035 http://www.distrelec.ch/ 301  
11 ok Old Shop ishopWebFront/catalog/home.do/* http://www.distrelec.ch/ishopWebFront/catalog/home.do/para/language/is/it/and/shop/is/IT/and/id/is/KP.html http://www.distrelec.ch/ 301  
12 ok Old distrelec folder http://www.distrelec.ch/distrelec/* http://www.distrelec.ch/distrelec/infocenter.nsf/0/373d084fb0d32ee2c12574400045bd7b/$FILE/Cat_ELFA_Distrelec_rgb.jpg http://www.distrelec.ch/ 301  
13 ok Old compare folder http://www.distrelec.ch/compare* http://www.distrelec.ch/compare/metaCompareProducts?_=1402272000000 http://www.distrelec.ch/ 301  
14 nok Old availability folder http://www.distrelec.ch/availability* http://www.distrelec.ch/availability?productCodes=17131751%2C11064087%2C11064090%2C11064092%2C17002220%2C17030570%2C17000064%2C17030084%2C17030661%2C17130693 http://www.distrelec.ch/ 301
15 nok The old language suffixed urls */en$ & */fr$ must be redirected in 301 to their new prefixed equivalent urls ^/fr/* ^/en/* https://www.distrelec.ch/power-switch-sot-223-2-a/infineon/isp452/610471/en http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Power-Switch-SOT-223-2-A-Infineon-ISP452/p/17101449 301  
16 ok Old cgi-bin folder http://www.distrelec.ch/cgi-bin/* http://www.distrelec.ch/cgi-bin/supply.storefront/438124486/Ext/go/p/019901_amaaadagabad/1/1?isfrom=search&id=&mathc=&results=20&SearchString=sfh2030&Subject=Stichwort&bilder=1 http://www.distrelec.ch/ 301  
17 nok Global 302 issue https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-4558   301  
18 ok Old lucene level 5 ishopWebFront/search/luceneSearch.do?dispatch=show&fromCatalog=true&filterHierarchyNodeId=21530&filterHierarchyLevel=5* https://www.distrelec.ch/ishopWebFront/search/luceneSearch.do?dispatch=show&fromCatalog=true&filterHierarchyNodeId=21530&filterHierarchyLevel=5&hierarchyDepth=0&autoAttributeEnabled=false http://www.distrelec.ch/Components/Active-Components/Analogue-Circuits/Amplifiers/Buffers/c/cat-21530 301 /ishopWebFront/search/luceneSearch.do?*&filterHierarchyNodeId=21530&filterHierarchyLevel=5* -301> //c/cat-21530
19 ok Old /ishopWebFront/infoCenter.do* http://www.distrelec.ch/ishopWebFront/infoCenter.do?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.distrelec.com%2Fdistrelec%2Finfocenter.nsf%2FAddressOverview%3FOpenForm%26country%3Dch%26language%3Dde http://www.distrelec.ch/ 301  
20 ok Old /ishopWebFront/document/* https://www.distrelec.ch/ishopWebFront/document/list.do?dispatch=newDocument http://www.distrelec.ch/ 301
item.summary: SEO - URL Migration Issues - Old diverse url pattern redirected to new equivalents

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

comments.comment:
The issue has been fixed.
Here some notes:

  • Number 5: missing because will be mapped with the full list of family views
  • Number 6: all the old documents have been redirected to /home
  • Number 15: still missing, work in progress.

The issue can be tested immediately in Quality system, even the fix version has not yet deployed.

In the attachment you can find the list of urls to be tested in Quality system.

Thank you Francesco !
Can you provide me a link to this "quality system" plateform (or it's just test.distrelec.ch) ?

Check on test.distrelec.ch :

  • issue n°2, 3, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 16, 18, 19, 20 : solved, ready to deploy
  • issue n°4, 5, 14, 15 : to fix
  • issue n°6 : to study
  • issue n°7, 17 : inside other jira tiquet
